name: Rails-skeleton
tagline: Project skeleton for a well made RubyOnRails project
body:
# Rails Skeleton

There is no need to reinvent the wheel, but reusing a bad wheel is dumb.
This project skeleton enables the **best plugins, practices, conventions and configurations** to **eliminate the boilerplate** needed for a new vanilla RubyOnRails project. 

## Authors and Contributors
* [Alessandro Molari](http://molarialessandro.info)
